1177360.name: Dreams of Ylina Demo
1177360.description:
Ann awakes on the island of Ylina. Nobody knows her and she doesn't remember anything. The problem is that Ylina is the last piece of land on Earth...

Explore the island of Ylina and find out about Ann's past in this adventure/action/RPG where you can choose to wander around in the forest at dusk, explore the underground ruins, or walk on the beaches staring at the infinite ocean.

Main features in Dreams of Ylina:
  • Exporation: Walk the hills, the forests, mountains, beaches and underground of Ylina, and wander in the sunset on the wild coast of the island,
  • Story: Discover what happened to Ann and what led her to Ylina,
  • Dialogs: Talk to the kind people of Ylina and enjoy their hospitality,
  • Treasures: Search in the underground ruins and in forgotten chests of the island to find items and weapons,
  • Quests: Help Ylinians and get their gartitude,
  • History: Learn about the history of Ylina and the events that forged its destiny...

Dreams of Ylina is an indie game made by Pangoweb.
1177360.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
